name: Mount Doom (MITgeek12)
description:
Are you ready to destroy the Ring with Frodo? Here is how you play:

  • Push down on the D key to move to the right
  • Push down on the A key to move to the left
  • Press the spacebar to jump
  • Click anywhere on the screen with your mouse or touchpad to throw rocks and kill Gollum and Nazguls
  • Reach the health potion or the sword to power-up
  • Get to the end of the game and reach the Ring with fire

Also, please post your comments about my game down below!
